QuestData.Title: A Time to Reap
QuestData.Description: No one knows better than the Cenarion Circle that this lush oasis could dry up as quickly as it appeared.$b$bWe must take care not to interfere with the processes taking place here, but to support and preserve them,$b$bA new species of plant, very plentiful in the surrounding region, has appeared since the great change.$b$bCollect samples of these for me, that I might study them and learn what they have to teach us,
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you collected the samples I require?
QuestData.RewardText: These are fine specimens, $r.$b$bI shall commence my studies immediately.
